text: Bill Kann (born August 13, 1993) is an American professional stock car racing driver. He currently competes part-time in the NASCAR K&N; Pro Series West, driving the No. 18 Chevrolet SS. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
